sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { HttpHeaders} from '@angular/common/http'; import { ProfileService } from '../profile.service'; import { environment } from '../../../environments/environment'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.scss'] }) export class ContactComponent implements OnInit { model: any = {}; constructor( private http: HttpClient ){} ngOnInit() { } onSubmit(name, subject, email, message) { const headers = new HttpHeaders({ 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }); this.http.post('https://formspree.io/f/mwkwpzve', { name: name, subject: subject, replyto: email, message: message }, { 'headers': headers }).subscribe( response => { console.log(response); } ); } }
